name: Constantinoble
description:
Hi, I developed a new game. You build entities (not sure about my theme), which produce gold. You have a main building, which gives you its full production value. After that you can build up to 4 vassal buildings. These give you a percentage of their accumulated wealth. After that you can build for each vassal up to 4 vassal buildings and so on. In order to have vassals of a certain rank, you have to be higher rank than them.

If the clicking gets to tiresome, you can select a building and copy its whole hierarchy with one of the 10 buttons on the left side. You can paste it with the  associated number.

Controls:
LMB = Select, Activate
Mouse Scroll = Zoom
1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0 = Paste Blueprint
R = Rotate Blueprint

Have fun!
